    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Boozy Bottle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2204)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tattoo depicts a container of alcohol, traditionally a small, uncorked brown bottle. You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126).

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You fail (but don't critically fail) an initial saving throw against a poison, or you gain [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29);  **Effect** You pick your poison. Calling out the name of a drink as though ordering at a bar, you negate the triggering poison. Instead, you become slightly drunk. For 10 minutes you’re [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) and gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
